desc: Your way to happiness is to leave your thoughts behind and let that fierce impulsivity take control.
bonus: Bonus happy & social from mean actions

desc: Happiness walks along stability, you want to feel safe, to know that everything is going to be alright.
bonus: Bonus happy each year while employed

desc: You have the mind of a genius! Even though, it's unpredictable. No one may ever know what comes next.
bonus: Always born with more than 40 smarts

desc: You have a very strong emotional, your path to happiness may be found in having someone at your side.
bonus: Bonus happy each year while married

desc: You want to draw attention, you want people to know your name, you feel like it's your birth right.
bonus: Always born with more than 40 looks

desc: You appreciate those with decorum and feel repulse towards vulgarity. You like to be rigorous with yourself.
bonus: Bonus happy each year with a degree

desc: For you, things need to be in balance. You find it's important to know how to be fair and to mediate issues.
bonus: No one gets happy by meing mean to you

desc: Whatever it takes to reach your goal, you're ready for it. Sometimes, consequences aren't scary at all!
bonus: Higher success rate when doing crimes

desc: You're a nice person. You smile a lot! Things in life tend to be easy for you, you appreciate good company.
bonus: Bonus happy each year while high social

desc: You're not good in being social, sometimes people see you as unsympathetic... But you're fine with it.
bonus: Bonus happy each year while low social

desc: You value being independent. You also value new things, new relationships, renewing yourself! It makes you happy.

desc: Romance is important. It's where you'll find happiness, be giving others love or receiving love from others.
bonus: Bonus happy & social from romantic actions
